scripts.say: The Eagle Union task force is steadily making its way towards the Siren stronghold.
Though the Sirens' counterattacks slowly grow stronger, they still pose no actual threat to the Eagle Union's ships.
Wow, we've made some astonishing progress. When we first decided to investigate the stronghold, we never got *this* close.
I'm guessing that's because the Sirens here are considerably tougher to deal with.
But we still have the upper hand when it comes to firepower and durability. Let our fleet handle things from here on out.
Ooh, do I hear an offer to clear the path for us?
Because if so, I'll gladly take it! My gear's from a bygone time, so I'd struggle to keep up anyway~
We really appreciate your assistance. The rest of our forces seem to always be busy with some other mission...
No need to thank us. You've got Sirens on your doorstep to deal with, so if anything we should be thanking you for coming with us.
Your number one priority is to take care of the Singularity. We know that too, of course.
For decades, the Northern Parliament has been engaged in a battle with the Sirens over the Bering Sea.
They may have experience, but their supplies are dwindling, and apparently they need support from other factions to hold the line...
Now if you don't mind, I shall join the Commander's convoy. Vanguard fleet, please be on your guards.
